subject: Re: love.fish quote
preview: That's fantastic thanks Heath. Give me some time to navigate through! Thanks x

full_threads.body:
That's fantastic thanks Heath.
Give me some time to navigate through! Thanks x

Hi Michelle, 

We have added the eat, drink and groups menu as a drop down from the 'Menu' item in the main navigation. 

We have also linked from the HOME and MENU pages to these respective new pages (replacing the PDF download links). You will also note that we have added the respective PDFs available for download from their relevant pages. 

I would also recommend that on the events page, you link to the groups menu page instead of the PDFs. 

Let me know if you would like any further tweaks?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: @heath done adding  bloody tommy’s margarita and ‘spring’ blush spritz to the Cocktails section and the non alcoholic at the bottom

@rica can you please
  • add the bloody tommy’s margarita and ‘spring’ blush spritz to the Cocktails section
  • Add the non-alcoholic bottomless mineral water to it's own section down the bottom (no need for it to be a menu at the top

@heath done with the drink menu and group menu, kindly check

https://www.lovefish.com.au/drink-menu/
https://www.lovefish.com.au/group-menu/

@rica you can get a start on this if you like? I'm 99% sure Michelle will want us to do it : )

Thanks

Hi Michelle, 

Yes sure we can load the rest of the menus up if you like too - let me know? 

We will then add them to the main menu etc in the most SEO friendly way. 

Confirming we have also fixed up butter.

Hi

It looks really good thank you.

just the 'r' is missing off the butter under bread roll

How will this appear on menu page??

We have a few menus, drinks, group etc - will they all be embedded like this on separate landing pages?

Please let me know how it works as with the SEO i need to be mindful of what to call new landing pages!

Michelle Grand-Milkovic

Founding Director



7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

info@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

please think of the environment before you print this email

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Michelle,

Confirming that we are done updating the new menu and ready for you to review it. 

Here's the link: https://www.lovefish.com.au/menu-new/

Let us know if you would like further changes.
@rica ok to send. looks good thank you!
@heath done updating the menu, kindly check then I'll reply to client

Hi Michelle, 

Sure, we have updated the styling and great to hear you are adding/tweaking content. 

Rica will populate the rest of the menu for you shortly and let you know once it's done.

@rica Can you please add the rest of the restaurant menu here: https://www.lovefish.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/C-2020-DINE-IN-SEPTEMBER.pdf to the new layout on this page: https://www.lovefish.com.au/menu-new/ - Thanks!

Heath,

That's wonderful thank you!

The reviews look great.

the menu page looks good too.
The only thing im not sure about is the dots. looks ok on mobile but not great on desktop.
I really like the fainter grey line as the divider between items that merrivale use (see screen shot)

also the lines between the categories. what are other options?

otherwise heaters, descriptions etc all good.

you can probably see i'm in the backend quite a bit trying to make the annoying seo man smile. not easy!
i have had to make a lot of copy changes as I realised our key search terms were not reflected in content.
if i have to do anything apart from copy changes i will ask support so i don't cause any issues!


M x

Michelle Grand-Milkovic
Founding Director


7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700
info@lovefish.com.au <mailto:info@lovefish.com.au> lovefish.com.au <http://lovefish.com.au/>
please think of the environment before you print this email

Hi Michelle,

Ok first up the GMB reviews are now in the footer : )

Secondly, check this out: https://www.lovefish.com.au/menu-new/ <https://www.lovefish.com.au/menu-new/> we still need to refine slightly, but if you like this direction, I will ask the team to add the rest of the menu items. We can do this as part of your monthly allowance by the way.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR
